column1: Little Goat Diner////We've driven past Little Goat Diner many times
column2: and held off on coming because of the 40 minute wait or line out the door. Tuesday night
column3: I came in on a late flight
column4: and we were driving down Randolph
column6: we decided to see if there would finally be no wait-- score! We even found street parking next to it!
